definition: mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
lit. to bite the teeth tightly (idiom); fig. to grit one's teeth and bear the pain/to bite the bullet
see 咬緊牙關|咬紧牙关[yao3 jin3 ya2 guan1]

sentences.english: His lips are tight; his jaw is clenched.
He lacdfds. com on his back, his teeth set, his right hand clenched on his breast.
sentences.chinese: 他仰卧着，牙关紧闭，右手紧握着拳头胸口上。

sentences.english: You have to bite the bullet.
sentences.chinese: 他说，“你一定要咬紧牙关坚持住。

sentences.english: It's not easy to bear up under such circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 在这样的环境下咬紧牙关坚持是不容易的。

sentences.english: The snow was blowing in his face, but the gritted his teeth and went on.
sentences.chinese: 大雪扑面，但是他咬紧牙关，继续前进。

sentences.english: This can be a teeth-grittingly painful procedure.
sentences.chinese: 这可以说是个需要咬紧牙关的痛苦过程。

sentences.english: It takes gritting your teeth. It takes discipline.
sentences.chinese: 你得咬紧牙关，你得有严格的纪律。

sentences.english: The snow was blowing in her face, but Ann gritted her teeth and went on.
sentences.chinese: 风雪打在她脸上，但安咬紧牙关继续向前走。

sentences.english: He lay on his back, his teeth set, his right hand clenched on his breast .
sentences.chinese: 他仰卧着，牙关紧闭，右手紧握着拳头放在胸口上。

sentences.english: Hanks so scrupulously, heroically mimes the wasting wought by the disease.
sentences.chinese: 汉克斯咬紧牙关，一丝不苟地模仿艾滋病造成的虚弱。

sentences.english: He clammed up when I asked him who else was involved.
sentences.chinese: 当我问他还有谁参与此事时，他咬紧牙关，不肯交代。

sentences.english: In spite of all kinds of torture, Sister Jiang gritted her teeth without saying a word.
sentences.chinese: 尽管受尽各种刑罚，江姐咬紧牙关不开口。

sentences.english: I groaned, set my teeth and reached forward again.
sentences.chinese: 我呻吟着咬紧牙关进行又一次前进的尝试。

sentences.english: Bigger's teeth clamped so tight that his jaws ached.
sentences.chinese: 别格的牙关咬得那么紧，连上下颚都疼了。

sentences.english: She stood before him, at the end of her speech, with her teeth clenched, her cheeks flaming.
sentences.chinese: 她讲完话，站在他面前，咬紧牙关，双颊通红。

sentences.english: Patients who develop trismus in association with the administration of succinylcholine may be susceptible to the subsequent development of malignant hyperthermia.
sentences.chinese: 这种牙关紧闭的患者还可以增加发生恶性高热的可能。

definition: lit. to bite the teeth tightly (idiom); fig. to grit one's teeth and bear the pain/to bite the bullet
see 咬緊牙關|咬紧牙关[yao3 jin3 ya2 guan1]
to clench one's teeth/to grind the teeth/gnaw
to open and close (the mouth etc)
